Package ru.nsu.lebedev.pizzeria

Class ThreadCourier

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.lebedev.pizzeria.ThreadCourier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, TerminableEmployee
public class ThreadCourier extends Object implements TerminableEmployee
RunnableCourier represents a courier running in its own thread.

The courier repeatedly attempts to fill its trunk by polling orders from the warehouse queue. Then, it delivers orders (simulated with a delay based on order deliveryTime). In case of delivery errors, undelivered orders are returned to the newOrders queue.
